rules.text: Don't forget to be awesome. Think about people complexly; everyone deserves that.
This server is meant for Nerdfighters. Please embody the ways of the Nerdfighters here.
Nothing illegal. This server is hosted in the US. Do not post anything that would be illegal under US law.
rules.hint: Please also be at least 13 years old. There are special internet rules in the US for folks younger than that (as there should be) and we don't meet those requirements. Sorry.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Use the Content Warnings when appropriate [link coming soon].
No copyrighted content. Please don't make us have to deal with Sony or Disney.
